## E-books

* [The Big Book of R](https://www.bigbookofr.com/) - Your last ever bookmark

* [R for Data Science](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/index.html)

## Print books

* The New Statistics in R - Andy Hector

* Statistics & Data Handling Skills in Biology  - Ennos & Johnson

* Discovering Statistics using R/SPSS - Andy Field

* The R Book - Michael J. Crawley

* Insights from Data with R - Petchey, Beckermann, Cooper, Childs

* Data Analysis with R statistical Software: A Guidebook for Scientists - Rob Thomas

* An Introduction to Statistical Learning - with Applications in R - James, Witten, Hastie, Tibshirani

* Mixed Effects Models and Extensions in Ecology with R - Statistics for Biology and Health - Alain Zuur
